programme.title: Playboy Dimindaku
programme.desc: Kisah Farid mempunyai banyak personaliti dan kekasih. Dia menggunakan personalitinya untuk berdepan dengan masalah dengan cara membiarkan personalitinya yang lain mengambil alih kekosongan yang dia tinggalkan itu.

programme.title: Seblak Empire Hentikan Ledakan Cinta
programme.desc: Secantik, Airin tetapi dia tidak malu untuk menjual seblak. Pada awalnya Rendra agak kesal kerana Airin menjual seblak, tetapi semakin lama Rendra telah jatuh cinta kepada Airin.

programme.title: Tour Guide Setengah Cinta
programme.desc: Tertekan dengan kerja di Jakarta, Monic (Masayu Clara) memilih untuk berehat dengan bercuti ke kampung. Tetapi ternyata Andra (Qausar Harta Yudana) adalah pemandu pelancong. Mengapa pemandu pelancong ini sangat kucar-kacir?

programme.title: Tmo Kaki Kitai
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Kaki Kitai

programme.title: Just The 3 Of Us
programme.desc: selepas terlanjur dengan seorang pramugari, seorang juruterbang syarikat penerbangan berdepan dengan kemungkinan bahawa dia mungkin menjadi bapa kepada anaknya yang belum lahir.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep2
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Senjakala Di Manado
programme.desc: Johny WW Lengkong (Ray Sahetapy), seorang pelaut yang telah meninggalkan keluarganya selama hampir 20 tahun, berniat kembali ke Manado dengan harapan keluarganya mau memaafkannya. Namun ternyata istrinya telah meninggal dunia dan meninggalkan seorang anak bernama Pingkan (Mikha Tambayong). Johny pun berjanji akan merawat Pingkan, tetapi ternyata semua tidak berjalan dengan mudah. Pingkan merasa terganggu tatkala Johny mulai mencampuri urusan asmaranya dengan Brando (Fero Walandouw), kekasihnya, lantaran Johny merasa Brando bukan pria baik-baik. Dari situlah konflik antara ayah dan anak mulai terjadi.

programme.title: Family Life Lope Banget
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang Tara dan Niko merupakan pasangan muda yang berjaya. Namun setelah menikah tiga tahun, mereka belum juga dikaruniai anak.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep7
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Neng Ojek Gemoy Gak Ngadi Ngadi
programme.desc: Tidak hanya cantik, Meta merupakan tukang ojek yang pemberani dan pintar. Tanpa disangka, profesinya mengantarkan ia bertemu dengan kekasih hatinya.

programme.title: Tmo Paku Pontianak
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Paku Pontianak

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep3
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Tour Guide Setengah Cinta
programme.desc: Tertekan dengan kerja di Jakarta, Monic (Masayu Clara) memilih untuk berehat dengan bercuti ke kampung. Tetapi ternyata Andra (Qausar Harta Yudana) adalah pemandu pelancong. Mengapa pemandu pelancong ini sangat kucar-kacir?

programme.title: Kau Langit Aku Laut
programme.desc: Anas seorang bekas ketua gangster telah menjalani hukuman penjara selama 7 tahun atas kesalahan merompak. Setelah dibebaskan, Anas tak mahu lagi mempertaruhkan hidupnya sebagai penjenayah.

programme.title: Romeo Vs Juliet
programme.desc: Haikal, Imran, Julie and Yasmin menetap di sebuah kawasan perumahan urban. Mereka berempat adalah contoh 'yuppies urban' yang amat menghargai individualiti masing-masing.

programme.title: Variety Jom Wayang S13 Ep16
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep7
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Sesalan Terakhir
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Natasha merupakan anak tidak sah taraf. Hidupnya tidak seperti orang lain. Dia dipinggirkan orang kampung kerana sikap ibunya, Auni, yang sering menjalinkan hubungan dengan lelaki kaya kerana ingin memiliki kekayaan. Puas Natasha menasihati ibunya supaya kembali ke jalan yang benar.

programme.title: The Dream Boyz
programme.desc: Lapan rakan dari sebuah kelab drama cuba menyelamatkan masyarakat mereka dan merealisasikan impian mereka untuk mengeluarkan filem mereka pada masa yang sama.

programme.title: Senjakala Di Manado
programme.desc: Johny WW Lengkong (Ray Sahetapy), seorang pelaut yang telah meninggalkan keluarganya selama hampir 20 tahun, berniat kembali ke Manado dengan harapan keluarganya mau memaafkannya. Namun ternyata istrinya telah meninggal dunia dan meninggalkan seorang anak bernama Pingkan (Mikha Tambayong). Johny pun berjanji akan merawat Pingkan, tetapi ternyata semua tidak berjalan dengan mudah. Pingkan merasa terganggu tatkala Johny mulai mencampuri urusan asmaranya dengan Brando (Fero Walandouw), kekasihnya, lantaran Johny merasa Brando bukan pria baik-baik. Dari situlah konflik antara ayah dan anak mulai terjadi.

programme.title: Tmo Paku Pontianak
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Paku Pontianak

programme.title: Misteri Akil Balik
programme.desc: Kemunculan Akil di kampung halamannya semula telah menimbulkan persoalan orang kampung. Malah mereka merasakan sejak adanya Akil di kampung itu pelbagai perkara misteri berlaku. Terutamanya dua orang pemuda kampung yang nakal iaitu Oden dan Ucop kerana mereka merasakan sejak Akil muncul, Hani, Hanim dan Hanum sering tergila-gilakan Akil. Mereka berdua rasa tergugat.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep3
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Midnight
programme.desc: Gofar (Gofar Hilman) dan Guntur (Guntur Tri Yoga) yang bertugas sebagai juruhebah radio di Jakarta, sentiasa berasa seperti ada yang menonton setiap siaran program Midnight mereka.

programme.title: Rama-Rama
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Sahira, yang hidupnya terkongkong dalam mengejar ilmu keduniaan. Sahira tidak berpeluang untuk hidup bersosial dengan rakan sebaya. Adakah Sahira akan terus dikongkong?

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep8
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: My Illegal Wife
programme.desc: Clarise mahukan suami dan cuba memikat Henry di dalam kapal terbang tetapi sia-sia. Namun, apabila pesawat itu terhempas di sebuah pulau, Henry hilang ingatan. Jadi, Clarise memutuskan untuk menggunakan amnesianya untuk kelebihannya.

programme.title: Tmo Misteri Bulan Madu
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Misteri Bulan Madu

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep4
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Bob Punya Baby
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki dan seorang wanita masing-masing memalsukan profail mereka dengan menggunakan gambar orang lain dan nama samaran untuk profail facebook mereka

programme.title: Genesis
programme.desc: Lebih kurang 30 tahun yang lampau, Dtk. Bakhtiar pernah bercinta dengan Zakiah. Apabila mendapati Zakiah telah mengandung dan enggan menggugurkannya, Dtk. Bakhtiar telah meninggalkannya dan terus menghilangkan diri.

programme.title: Senjakala Di Manado

Namun ternyata istrinya telah meninggal dunia dan meninggalkan seorang anak bernama Pingkan (Mikha Tambayong). programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep8
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Finally Found Someone
programme.desc: Aprilyn, seorang wanita muda, kecewa apabila tunangnya meninggalkannya di altar. Kemudian, dia bertemu dengan Raffy, seorang lelaki yang cuba membantunya pulih daripada kesedihannya.

programme.title: Sir Sa
programme.desc: Satu lagi kisah cinta segi tiga berlaku di kalangan kawan rapat yang jatuh cinta dengan gadis yang sama. Cerita itu bertukar atas dan ke bawah dengan ketawa dan kegembiraan, tetapi adakah salah satu daripada mereka akan mendapat pengakhiran yang bahagia

programme.title: Midnight
programme.desc: Gofar (Gofar Hilman) dan Guntur (Guntur Tri Yoga) yang bertugas sebagai juruhebah radio di Jakarta, sentiasa berasa seperti ada yang menonton setiap siaran program Midnight mereka.

programme.title: Tmo Misteri Bulan Madu
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Misteri Bulan Madu

programme.title: Pad Thai
programme.desc: Petchara, seorang penjual pad thai di pasar, menyertai pertandingan makan Pad-thai untuk memenangi harga satu juta baht. Dia mempunyai ramai pesaing yang bersedia untuk menang. Salah seorang daripada mereka ialah bekas teman lelakinya, Surachart, yang tidak mahu kehilangannya lagi. Dan Suchat, seorang guru muda yang merupakan jirannya yang mempunyai ramai peminat di kampungnya dan ramai pemuda top di kampungnya adalah tip untuk memenangi pertandingan ini. Perlumbaan untuk mencapai kemenangan bukanlah mudah.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep4
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: The Mistress
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Sari yang terpaksa melangsaikan hutang milik keluarganya dengan menjadi wanita simpanan kepada seorang usahawan berjaya yang bernama rico Namun semuanya mulai berubah selepas Eric anak kepada Rico secara tidak sengaja telah jatuh cinta terhadap sari

programme.title: Tour Guide Setengah Cinta
programme.desc: Tertekan dengan kerja di Jakarta, Monic (Masayu Clara) memilih untuk berehat dengan bercuti ke kampung. Tetapi ternyata Andra (Qausar Harta Yudana) adalah pemandu pelancong. Mengapa pemandu pelancong ini sangat kucar-kacir?

programme.title: Cinta Dodol Inilah Yang Membuatku Lengket Kepadamu
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang seorang gadis bernama Marini yang dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seorang rentenir. Marini bertekad untuk bekerja di Garut untuk melunaskan hutang ayahnya kepada rentenir tersebut. Kemudian, ada Mas Raka, cucu pemilik tempat di mana Mar

programme.title: D'Academy Asia 6 Ep27
programme.desc: D'Academy Asia dengan slogan "Suara Sejati Asia" adalah pertandingan menyanyi dangdut tingkat Asia. Negara berikutnya yang akan bergabung dalam DA Asia 6 adalah Trkiye! Bersiaplah menjadi bintang dangdut terbesar di Asia!

programme.title: Kopi Kopimu Kopinang Kau Dengan Bismillah
programme.desc: Marsha ditipu oleh sebuah agensi pencari kerja. Alamat yang diberikan sebenarnya adalah alamat kedai kopi milik Radith, sehingga akhirnya Marsha bekerja di kedai Radith. Tanpa disedari, timbul perasaan cinta di antara mereka berdua.

programme.title: Doyan Makan Ep28
programme.desc: Doyan Makan menjemput penonton untuk mengikuti perjalanan dan pengalaman kulinari untuk makanan popular di kawasan tersebut, serta akan meninjau informasi tentang tempat, harga dan proses penghasilan makanan yang mereka nikmati.

programme.title: Indonesia Pintar S2 Ep15
programme.desc: Rancangan permainan terbesar di Indonesia yang mempertandingkan kecerdasan dan kecekapan 100 pelajar sekolah. Program ini diisi dengan pelbagai permainan menarik dan hadiah keseluruhan bernilai jutaan rupiah.

programme.title: Satu Cinta Dua Hati Ep20
programme.desc: Rumah tangga Salwa dan Fahri dikurniakan dua cahaya mata iaitu Nayla dan Arsya. Perkahwinan yang pada asalnya penuh kebahagiaan kini berakhir dengan duka apabila Fahri memutuskan untuk meninggalkan keluarganya bagi merantau ke bandar demi mengejar kejayaa

programme.title: Menerima Tukar Tambah Ayang
programme.desc: Ayah Dini mengatur satu sandiwara di mana Gito dan Dini menukar tempat, dengan Gito menjadi anak orang kaya dan Dini menjadi anak orang miskin. Namun, semua itu tidak menghilangkan cinta antara Dini dan Gito.

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep234
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. Nadia dengan sengaja menghantar Dafri untuk belaja

programme.title: Keajaiban Cinta Ep29
programme.desc: Siri ini diarahkan oleh Gita Asmara dan dibintangi oleh Aliando Syarief, Sitha Marino, dan Erdin Werdrayana. Kisah Keajaiban Cinta berkisar tentang Darwin (lakonan Aliando Syarief) dan Tiana (lakonan Sitha Marino). Mereka menghadapi pertikaian keluarga ya

programme.title: Jalan-Jalan Sultan Ep7
programme.desc: Pengacara-pengacara meneroka beberapa destinasi pelancongan terbaik di Indonesia, dan bertanya soalan kepada beberapa pengunjung. Mereka yang menjawab dengan betul akan menerima hadiah.

programme.title: The Neighbors
programme.desc: A young girl was murdered and resident of the building suspects the killer lives among them. The battle against this murderous neighbor begins.

programme.title: Villain & Widow
programme.desc: Widow Yeon-ju rents out the second floor of her home to a novelist. The neighbors suspect the novelists true identity as he spends an inordinate time whenever he's left home alone

programme.title: Very Ordinary Couple
programme.desc: A couple working in the same bank broke up but continue to see each other in workplace. They couldn't help but pay attention to each other even more than they were dating...

programme.title: The Hot-Blooded
programme.desc: 4 friends gave up on Taekwondo and part ways after being asked to lose on purpose in a trial. Years later, they decided to take on a local gang realizing their hometown is threatened.

programme.title: Countdown (2023)
programme.desc: When an Olympic gold medalist boxer met a young boxer who falls victim to match fixing, he vows to start a boxing team at the school he teaches at and give his student a shot at the nationals.

programme.title: The Magician
programme.desc: A talented young magician falls for a princess betrothed to his former teacher, leading to a fierce showdown between the two powerful magicians.

programme.title: The Witch: Part 2. The Other One
programme.desc: A mysterious girl survived a blood raid in a secret lab found herself being tracked down by a group of assassins.

programme.title: Noryang: Deadly Sea
programme.desc: Based on the historical Battle of Noryang in 1598. A story of Yi Sun-Shin's last battle during the Japanese invasions of Korea.

programme.title: Baseball Girl
programme.desc: A young girl is graduating from high school and determined to become the first female player to join a professional baseball in Korea.

programme.title: A Melody To Remember
programme.desc: Amidst the Korean War in 1952, Lt. Han Sang-ryul formed a choir with the orphaned refugee children in Busan, finding solace and purpose through music, despite the hardships of war.

programme.title: Perfect Game
programme.desc: On May 16, 1987, Korea's two greatest pitchers of the day, face off to determine who is the better pitcher, in an epic game that would go down in baseball history.

programme.title: My Perfect Roommate

programme.title: Lucky Chan-Sil

programme.desc: Kim Ji-young, an ordinary Korean woman in her 30s, suddenly shows signs of being inhabited by her late mother and older sister after she becomes a stay-at-home mother.

programme.title: 200 Pounds Beauty
programme.desc: A timid, overweight and under-appreciated back-up singer resorts to drastic "head-to-toe" plastic surgery to become a pop diva.

programme.title: Single In Seoul

programme.title: The Charm of Jiangsu You’re Never Known Ep2
programme.desc: Led by Meng Fei, an exploration team is embarking on a journey through the province of Jiangsu in China. Comprised of academic experts, cultural celebrities, and exceptional local youth, their mission is to delve into the fascinating towns, unearthing the rich history and cultural significance that lies within. The initiative aims to attract more tourists to Jiangsu and allow them to experience the "flavorful life."

programme.title: Memory of the Taste Ep8
programme.desc: Starting from food, it conveys the taste of his hometown, creates food in the most pristine way, and sends condolences to family members overseas to convey deep feelings of homesickness.

programme.title: Go! Grand Canal Ep8
programme.desc: The Grand Canal, a world heritage site, will be explored from various perspectives, including history, politics, culture, and economics, highlighting its spiritual values and contributions to Chinese nation's history and culture.

programme.title: Youngster Story Tours Ep12
programme.desc: Using "learning through fun" to demonstrate the correct way to "read ten thousand books, travel ten thousand miles," and to embark on a unique journey of discovery through a different path of growth.

programme.title: The Decade Ep12
programme.desc: The documentary records the Decade Witnesses who participate on national infrastructure and construction, experienced great changes on profound modification.

programme.title: Slam Dunk Teenager Season 2 Ep11
programme.desc: A reality show combined with AI image Captain.S virtual scene presentation to achieve a more diversified screen content. Gathered young athletes with basketball elites from 30 cities, the event is divided into three stages: city audition, star training camp and the ultimate battle, creating more innovative ways to play.

programme.title: The Foodie Journey Season 2 Ep13
programme.desc: Chinese food culture is vast and profound, with each region having its own signature dishes. Everyone has different memories associated with food. This program explores the stories behind delicious food and preserves Chinese culinary culture.

programme.title: Go Fighting! Season 9 (Repackaged) Ep11
programme.desc: Go Fighting! is a game-variety-reality show, Shermaine Wong, Wowkie Zhang, Gong Jun, Justin Huang, Yan Hoaxing, Johnny Huang, Jia Nailiang and Yun-peng Yue formed as challenging team to complete missions with an open-ended outdoor project at a landmark to win the objective.

programme.title: China In Intangible Cultural Heritage Ep36
programme.desc: China has created a great treasure of intangible cultural heritage. The program records a long history and distinctive characteristics in various parts of China, with its aesthetics and wisdom. It shows China's rich and colourful cultural temperament.

programme.title: Ambassador’s Kitchen Ep10
programme.desc: Food is an easy way to make friends! The reality show with guests Li Chen, Joseph Wu, Laurinda Ho and Julius Liu bring you into the embassies of Argentina, New Zealand, Thailand, Iceland, Turkey, Ireland to explore the authentic exotic combined with Chinese gourmet.

programme.title: Travel through Jiangsu Season 2 Ep40
programme.desc: Travel around the scenic spots and historic sites and the streets and alleys of the whole province of Jiangsu, look for historians, scholars, folk artisans, etc., explore a glimpse of what traditional Chinese culture and discover the unique charm of Jiangsu.

programme.title: Rendezvous with the Grand Canal Ep5
programme.desc: Intangible cultural heritage seekers follow the cultural context of the canal, exploring a city, meeting a creative inheritor of intangible cultural heritage, and sharing an enduring story of the canal. It showcases the beauty of craftsmanship, intangible cultural heritage, and local culture along the Grand Canal in Jiangsu Province.

programme.title: No. 17 Live House Season 2 (Repackaged) Ep6
programme.desc: Five musicians, Liang Long, Hu Xia, Bai Jugang, Xilinnayi Gao, and Huang Zihongfan, have reversed their image as singers and became Live House staff, embarking on a new music journey with a brand-new attitude. At the same time, they launched a new slogan, "There is always endless happiness", inviting us to witness more beauty and surprises in life together.

programme.title: Across the Strait Ep231
programme.desc: The Across the Strait traces the much-discussed issues across the Strait, reflects the will of the citizens on two sides of the Strait and details the Chinese Governments policy of one country, two systems in a bid to enhance the Taiwan fellowmens understanding of the Mainland China.

programme.title: A Hint of You (M) Ep5657
programme.desc: As the chef and owner of "All One Hundred" stir-fry restaurant, Ching-Yo Xia is determined to recreate the delicious fried rice her father used to make. To achieve this, she hones her culinary skills by learning from Master Chef Zhai-Yu Fu of a high-end teppanyaki restaurant. Despite her resilience and fearlessness in the face of challenges, Ching-Yo somehow manages to turn Culinary Prince Zhai-Yu's graceful life upside down!

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep109
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4932
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3864
programme.desc: Stylish Man The Chef is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. Stylish Man The Chef containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep49314932

Stylish Man The Chef containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep1010
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2229
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep111
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4933
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: S Storm
programme.desc: ICAC officer Luk witnesses a suspects murder while investigating an illegal soccer gambling case, but is unable to disclose information to Chief Inspector Lau due to his code of confidentiality, thereby hindering Laus investigation. While starting the case with mutual distrust, they end up reaching a rapport to uproot the crime syndicate.

programme.title: Dearest Anita
programme.desc: Based on real events, the movie follows the footsteps of the fans of Hong Kong Canto-pop diva Anita Mui. After the death of the popstar, fans from different walks of life risk arrest to track down handwritten cards, letters and other possessions from Anita Mui to preserve their idols memory.

programme.title: The Way We Are
programme.desc: Set in Tin Shui Wai, a marginalised satellite town, Kwai is a middle-aged widow who works hard in a neighbourhood supermarket to support herself and her son. They lead a mundane but fulfilling life. When an elderly woman who lives alone moved in to Tin Shui Wai, Kwai strikes up a friendship with her and helps her ease into a new life.

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Master Luo, a washed-up stuntman, trains his beloved horse Red Hare to be a stunt horse. Due to his debts though, Red Hare may be taken away by the debtors. Master Luo has no choice but to seek help from his estranged daughter, and the incident ends up becoming a golden opportunity for them to reconcile.

programme.title: Fagara
programme.desc: After her fathers death, a Hong Kong girl discovers she has two hitherto unknown sisters, Branch and Cherry. Through taking up her late fathers hotpot restaurant, she reunites with her sisters by different mothers, and understands her father more from a different perspective, allowing her to finally resolve her long-time hard feelings with him.

programme.title: Born to Fly
programme.desc: Lei Yu has officially become the new generation of Chinese test pilots after rounds of strict selection. Captain Zhang Ting leads Lei Yu and other pilots to test the latest fighter jets. Lei Yu keeps pushing the limits in each test flight in the hope of coming up with the perfect plane to ensure the safety of the fighter pilots.

programme.title: Turns We Take
programme.desc: A spicy hot pot restaurant in Northeast China serves different types of customers every day. Amongst them are a sweet young couple, two wayward young men and a taxi driver. Despite being complete strangers to each other, their lives are intertwined by a traffic accident

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover Police Nick has spent 8 years working for the drug baron Quin, so as to collect evidence of his drug trafficking activities. After gaining Quins trust, Nick becomes his protg and succeeds him as the drug baron when Quin retires. However, Nick has lost himself in his split life between trading drugs and searching for criminal evidence.

programme.title: Endless Battle
programme.desc: This is a story about two brothers. The younger brother is a drug lord while the elder brother Zhong is a police officer in the Narcotics Bureau. Both are involved in a drug cartels turf battle and during an escort mission, Zhong discovers his brothers hidden identity. This leads to an endless battle between good and evil.

programme.title: Break Up Club
programme.desc: Joe (Jaycee Chan) is a 20-something slacker who only takes one thing seriously: his on-and-off girlfriend Flora (Fiona Sit). After their latest breakup, Joe goes to an audition for a documentary by director Barbara Wong (the director, playing herself). Handed a camera, Joe records his discovery of a magical website that reunites him with Flora at the price of breaking up his best friend (Patrick Tang) and his girlfriend. However, despite the efficiency of the website, Joe's refusal to change his immature ways and Flora's attraction to a talented graffiti artist (Hayama Hiro) threatens to break them up once more.

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair
programme.desc: Based on the 1954 martial arts novel by acclaimed author Liang Yu-sang, this film details the tragic romance between wild swordsman Zhuo Yi-hang and rival cult assassin Lien Ni-chang, with a dark, erotic and visually stunning twist.

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor and his student must fight with their lives to stop the criminals from obtaining a bullet from inside a corpse that is a key piece of evidence in a deadly crime.

programme.title: A Guilty Conscience
programme.desc: Due to the negligence of sharp-tongued barrister Adrian, his innocent client is convicted of murder and sentenced to 17 years in jail. An opportunity to appeal the case and free his client arises a few years later, but in order to right his wrong, he must fight against one of the most powerful families in Hong Kong for justice to prevail.

programme.title: I Love Hong Kong 2013
programme.desc: Sung Chi Hung and Ha Shek Lam worked at a Chinese restaurant when they were young and both fell in love with the owners daughter, Yeung. Sung and Yeung eventually got married and took over the restaurant. Many years later, Sung meets Ha who is now a real estate tycoon and plans to buy out the restaurant. Can Sung save the restaurant?

programme.title: Mr. Long
programme.desc: A Taiwanese hitman Mr. Long escapes from the triad after his assignment in Tokyo gone awry. He encounters a Taiwanese woman and her son and the three of them start a new life together. Unfortunately, Mr. Long is being pursued by the triad again

programme.title: The White Storm
programme.desc: Three Narcotics Bureau officers who are good friends get involved in a case with the drug lord. When the operation fails, they must make a devastating decision - two can live, but one must die. Five years later, the two vow to take revenge but end up competing against each other for their own lives. Will brotherhood be sacrificed again?

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Changs first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunts puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: Social Distancing
programme.desc: Cherry is a young girl addicted to the internet. After seeing a warning video about an e-ghost on YouTube, she begins to encounter many mysterious incidents, and the e-ghost also takes control of her family. Cherry must face her unbearable past in order to get out of this horrifying paranormal world...

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon (2020)
programme.desc: In 1960s Hong Kong, rookie cop Xu Le cracks a robbery but gets demoted instead, as this offends a corrupt inspector. Xu meets a rich girl Bai who falls instantly in love with him one day. Will he break up with his childhood girlfriend for Bai so as to climb the social ladder, and how does Xu eventually become one of Hong Kongs legendary detective?

programme.title: The Movie Emperor
programme.desc: Hong Kong megastar Lau Wai Chi aspires to win a film award. He teams up with director Lin Hao to make a film about rural China so as to win at the international film festival, and experiences local village life for the farmers role. This ends up in a series of hilarious events instead.

programme.title: May We Chat
programme.desc: Yan, Wei Wei and Yi Ji are three troubled young women from very different backgrounds who met on We Chat, a social media platform, and will do anything to escape each of their troubled lives. When Yan suddenly disappears one day, Wei Wei and Yi Ji start to track her whereabouts, only to find out shocking truths about her that were never revealed.

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the faade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: Wise Guys Never Die
programme.desc: Nick meets Teddy, a con artiste, when he is sent to prison for embezzlement, and Teddy teaches him all the gambling tricks. After their release, they team up with Teddys lover Lora, to take revenge on Dragon, who framed Teddy for his sentence. Nick though is seduced by Lora and they end up in an affair. Will Nick finally join Teddy in his revenge?

programme.title: My Blue Summer
programme.desc: Zhi has been secretly in love with Nan since she met him once as a child. After graduating high school, Zhi realizes that she and Nan are in the same university, where they get to know each other by chance and become close friends. However, Zhi is still too shy to express her love for Nan. Will this long-term crush finally turn into true love?

programme.title: Over My Dead Body
programme.desc: This dark comedy begins with an unidentified corpse appearing at the doorstep of a residential flat. Fearing that the corpse will turn their flats into "haunted flats", which will cause a drastic drop in the property value, the four families living on the same floor attempt to move the corpse away, embroiling themselves in chaos.

programme.title: Band Four
programme.desc: An aspiring singer of an indie band called Band Four reunites with her estranged guitarist father following the death of her mother. Together with her half-sister and her nine-year-old son, the newly reunited family come together to support each other through their love and passion for music.

programme.title: My Kickass Wife
programme.desc: Jade is a beautiful royal guard who is set up for marriage by the Queen in order to avoid the King setting eyes on her. Jade falls for Sean and helps him win the contest for her. After the wedding, Sean discovers her bad temper and visits a brothel in his despair. He meets and is attracted to a girl there, not knowing she has a secret agenda...

programme.title: The Narrow Road
programme.desc: Chak, a small cleaning company owner, hits tough times during the pandemic. In need of an assistant, he hires a young single mother Candy, who unexpectedly helps him solve many difficulties at work. While life seems to get back on track, a series of cruel realities happen again, but they still bond together to support each other on the narrow road.

programme.title: Seobok
programme.desc: Former secret agent Ki Hun is entrusted with a secret mission to escort the first human clone, Seobok, to a safe place. Seobok, who possesses a life-preserving DNA that could save humanity, explores the outside world with Ki Hun for the first time but they are both chased and claimed as terrorists by CIA. How can Ki Hun protect Seobok from danger?

programme.title: YUM Investigation
programme.desc: YUM is a detective agency that handles supernatural cases. As YUM investigates the evil spirits appearing in an old building, they discover that the spirits are created by a spirit master to haunt the residents so that the building can be vacated for redevelopment. Can the YUM investigators finally find ways to fight against the master?

programme.title: Echoes of the Thunder
programme.desc: Two half-brothers, Nam and Fire, are top racing drivers. In a racing challenge with Japanese driver Kenji, Nam causes a young racing driver to be seriously injured and is depressed. Fire stands up for Nam and decides to compete with Kenji in an illegal street car race. Who will win the race? Can Nam finally bounce back?

programme.title: S Storm
programme.desc: ICAC officer Luk witnesses a suspects murder while investigating an illegal soccer gambling case, but is unable to disclose information to Chief Inspector Lau due to his code of confidentiality, thereby hindering Laus investigation. While starting the case with mutual distrust, they end up reaching a rapport to uproot the crime syndicate.

programme.title: Clans of Intrigue
programme.desc: Heroic outlaw Chu Liu Xiang is dining with his friend Monk Wu Hua, when Gong from the Holy Water Palace appears and accuses Chu of stealing the holy water from her Palace and using it for various murders. Chu denies, and is given a month to find the murderer or be killed by Gong. To prove his innocence, Chu decides to investigate the case

programme.title: The Butterfly Chalice
programme.desc: Starring the stunning, teenage heartthrob Pat Ting Hung, The Butterfly Chalice marks the important directing debut of the kung-fu film genre's most principle figure Chang Cheh, as he burst the martial arts and swordplay movie doors wide open, announcing the beginning of the end for the Cantonese musicals.

programme.title: The Black Falcon
programme.desc: Jenny Hu and veteran co-star Margaret Tu Chuan join longtime0020idol Paul Chang Chung in a battle against the notorious Black Falcon crime mob in Singapore. Together they have to face forgery, fire, and even poisoned needles to stop the mob.

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xus until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: Little Hero
programme.desc: An orphan, Little Bastard is taken on and trained as a fighter by a hermit. When Little Bastard grows up, he feels he is old enough to go out and look for his parents. Luckily for him, he befriends a beggar, Hsiao Yi, who being street-wise, manages to help him find his family, but somehow gets into trouble with the gang.

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: Wu Song is appointed as chief constable after killing a tiger with his bare hands when drunk. The wife of his brother Wu Da Lang, seduces Wu Song but gets rejected by him, and engages in an affair with a rich man. They poison Wu Da Lang when he finds out about their affair. To avenge his brothers death, Wu Song kills both of them.

programme.title: Long Road to Gallantry
programme.desc: Tu Meng Fei makes his way to the world after completing his kung fu training. En route, he rescues Mu Wan Erh and Li San Nan from a band of thugs and later learnt of a 20-year conflict between the evil Thunder Gang Chief Leng Tian Lei and the Dragon Sect. Mus lost father is none other than the Thunder Gang Chief, who also killed Lis father

programme.title: Tropicana Interlude
programme.desc: Ping and Su are lovers who operate a travel agency specializing in Southeast Asian holidays. Tung, a school mistress, and her students join a guided tour lead by Ping. During the trip, a spoiled kid Li is attracted to Ping but Su thinks Ping has fallen for Tung and leaves. How will Ping deal with the situation and ends up happily back with Su?

programme.title: Shaolin Temple
programme.desc: As more people are learning martial arts from Shaolin, the Qing court orders for it to be banned and plans to destroy the temple. The Shaolin disciples decide to take their protest to the streets, using Shaolin skills to curb their hatred, but when the Qing troops start attacking Shaolin Temple, the disciples vow to protect it at all costs.

programme.title: Moods Of Love
programme.desc: This Song Dynasty period piece about how far one would go for love (or lust) has two tales. The first involves a devilish magistrate who tries to tempt a Buddhist monk out of his self-professed celibacy by hiring a pretty prostitute. The second is the tragic tale of an exploited young girl who is forced to work in an unscrupulous couples brothel.

programme.title: Inside The Forbidden City
programme.desc: Justice Bao discovers that Consort Lis new born son was swapped at birth and that she was expelled from the palace by Empress Liu twenty years ago. He sets Eunuch Guo up to confess his conspiracy with the Empress. Empress Liu is convicted for her act and Consort Li finally reunites with her son who is now the Emperor.

programme.title: Let's Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung, the son of a rich entrepreneur, meets Lian Lian, the niece of a kindergarten principal by chance. They get into a misunderstanding at the first meeting, causing Da Yung to lose his wallet. Further misunderstanding occurs when he tries to use her to act as his fianc, in order to drive away two women whom he does not like

programme.title: Full Moon Scimitar
programme.desc: Swordsman Ding fought against many swordsmen and won, so he took his first defeat badly and wanted to commit suicide. It is then that he meets the granddaughter of a mystic Sect leader and falls in love. When they want to get married, the Sect leader presents Ding with the Full Moon Scimitar, on the condition that he will never leave the sect.

programme.title: The Millionaire Chase
programme.desc: It's a fun and wild romp that mixes pleasure with pleasure. A nightclub owner, playboy Peter Chen Ho, has his ways with three sisters while gallivanting across Asia. Each one has a dangling relationship to save - ensuring a series of mishaps and comic moments.

programme.title: Invincible Enforcer
programme.desc: A young man is at the wrong place at the wrong time. As he offends a police inspector, he is thrown into jail and even when released, the police goes after him until he has no choice but to become a real criminal. Only a kind and beautiful probation officer is on his side, but can she help him?

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: When Jianying discovers the Zhao clan's fortune will be left to his brother Yulong, he engineers his parents' death and sends his own son out to kill Yulong.

programme.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
programme.desc: A beautiful but ignorant woman is abducted by aliens but nobody believes her close encounter. While planning a suicide to prove herself, she meets a failed detective who is also planning his suicide. They change their minds about dying after finding each other and start to encounter bizarre adventures, before falling in love with each other.

programme.title: The Sword of Swords
programme.desc: The Sword Master passes on his sword to his disciple Lin before he dies. Another disciple Fang also eyes the sword and plots to take it away from Lin, destroying his family and blinding him in the process. Lin finally battles Fang for revenge and vows to reclaim his sword.

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: Ying Tai disguises herself as a boy to go to school and falls hopelessly in love with her classmate, Shan Bo. After Shan Bo realizes her true identity, he proposes marriage to Ying Tai. However, they are kept apart as she is engaged to another man. Knowing Shan Bo died in despair, Ying Tai is in deep sorrow and kills herself at his grave.

programme.title: The Pirate
programme.desc: Pirate Chang Pao Chai discovers a leak in his ship after a successful raid on a foreign merchant ship. He goes ashore to get materials to patch up his ship, but encounters corrupt Qing officials oppressing the poor peasants. A good man at heart, he decides to help the peasants and gain a reputation of being a great pirate in the process.

programme.title: The Female Prince
programme.desc: Hsiao's stepmother frames her fianc Lung when he refuses to forfeit their engagement and sends him to prison. To save him, Hsiao disguises as Lung to take the Imperial exam and ranks first place. Impressed by Hsiao, the Emperor weds the Princess to 'him'. When Hsiao comes clean on their wedding night, she persuades the Princess to follow a plan

programme.title: King Gambler
programme.desc: This film was actually a lively forerunner to the gambling film craze, which eventually swept Asian cinema. Here, it's cardsharp versus cardsharp with a lot more kung-fu action, in a battle of wits and fists to become the king of the casino. The double stings and triple crosses raise in complexity and imagination until what started as an unusual box office risk became a top ten hit of 1976.

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: The story follows Monk Tang San Zangs journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing.

programme.title: Descendant of the Sun
programme.desc: Shi Sheng is adopted by an old carpenter and grows up to possess extraordinary superpowers. One day, he unexpectedly discovers his identity as the son of the solar deity and learns that his power will be lost during solar eclipse. When an evil spirit appears and wreaks havoc, Shi Sheng must beat him in an ultimate duel to save the world.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperors death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: The Champion
programme.desc: After years in prison, Lu Hu returns home to find himself set up by his ruthless brother Piao, who has taken over the family coal mine business and imprisoned their sister. Hu takes down Piao and saves his sister but their coal mine falls into the hands of a Japanese gang, which Hu and his sister must fight in order to get it back.

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Changs. On the Changs farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: Crippled Avengers
programme.desc: Chu Twin becomes crazy after his sons arms were chopped off. For no reason, he harms four people causing them various disabilities. The four disabled form a band to learn Kung Fu from a master, in order to take revenge on Chu Twin.

programme.title: Tales of Larceny
programme.desc: Connecting all the antics of bosses, monks, beggars, and thieves is the slippery and sinuous efforts of three pickpockets so adept at their chosen skill that they can even trick three beauties of their underwear without missing a step.

programme.title: To Kill a Jaguar
programme.desc: Set in 1920s Shanghai, a village girl journeys to the big city in search of her father and meets her childhood friend Jaguar, who works for the mob boss Kam. In a world controlled by the mobs, it is a test of survival for all as Jaguar allies himself with ace gunman Ko Tang, to take over Kams empire.

programme.title: Between Tears and Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The Generals henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: The Spiritual Boxer
programme.desc: One of the first kung fu comedies, this is a story about a con artist who uses kung fu to swindle villagers for money by pretending to be possessed by spirits. When they are threatened by bandits, he must use the same skills for good.

programme.title: Hagola Ep89
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Hagola Ep90
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Hagola Ep91
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Hagola Ep92
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Hagola Ep93
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep2
programme.desc: Gurus onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bholes unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of its kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep3
programme.desc: Gurus onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bholes unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of its kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep4
programme.desc: Gurus onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bholes unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of its kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep5

programme.desc: A blind girl receives a cornea transplant so that she is able to see again. However, she gets more than she bargains for when she realizes she can see disturbing ghosts.

programme.title: Insomnia
programme.desc: Two Los Angeles homicide detectives are dispatched to a northern town where the sun doesn't set to investigate the methodical murder of a local teen.

programme.title: The International
programme.desc: Clive Owen and Naomi Watts star in an adrenaline-pumping, action-packed thrill ride about a man determined to deliver justice to a corrupt international arms-dealing ringthat funds worldwide genocide and terrorism...no matter the cost!

programme.title: Global Effect
programme.desc: A soldier (Daniel Bernhardt) leads a band of mercenaries to rescue a scientist (Mdchen Amick) and prevent a terrorist (Joel West) from unleashing a devastating virus.

programme.title: The Ninth Gate
programme.desc: Dean Corso is a rare book dealer with a taste for the finer things in life. When he is tasked with hunting down a dangerous sorcery book, he finds himself caught up in the chilling world of black magic, where he soon realizes he is out of his depth.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: An unlikely group of former '80s video game champions step up to save the world from an alien invasion in this visually spectacular action-adventure.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: Britt Reid is a rich, spoiled playboy who has been happy to maintain a direction-less existence. When his father James Reid dies, Britt meets an impressive and resourceful company employee, Kato.

programme.title: Come Out Fighting
programme.desc: During WWII, the American army have raced their way through the countryside on the border of France entering Nazi Germany Hitler has deployed his secret weapon Lieutenant Frank Ross encounters the Nazi weapon and an intense aerial battle ensues

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: Welcome to Rekall, the company that can turn your dreams into real memories. For Douglas Quaid, even though he's got a beautiful wife whom he loves, the mind-trip sounds like the perfect vacation from his frustrating life.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder
programme.desc: A pampered actor and his co-stars become part of a real war in a Southeast Asian jungle.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: A blind girl receives a cornea transplant so that she is able to see again. However, she gets more than she bargains for when she realizes she can see disturbing ghosts.

programme.title: Hard Target 2
programme.desc: Disgraced and retired mixed martial artist Wes The Jailor Baylor (Scott Adkins) couldn't refuse the million-dollar purse offered to fight in Myanmar.

programme.title: War
programme.desc: After his partner Tom Wynne and familyare killed by the infamousand elusive assassin Rogue (Jet Li), FBI agent Jack Crawford (Jason Statham) becomes obsessedwith revenge as his world unravels into a vortex of guilt and betrayal.

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: A reimagining of the classic horror tale about Carrie White, a shy girl outcast by her peers and sheltered by her deeply religious mother, who unleashes telekinetic terror on her small town after being pushed too far at her senior prom.

programme.title: Wolf
programme.desc: A mild-mannered book editor (Jack Nicholson) bitten by a wolf goes for the throat of all who have betrayed him. Michelle Pfeiffer co-stars.

programme.title: Sahara
programme.desc: Master explorer Dirk Pitt goes on the adventure of a lifetime of seeking out a lost Civil War battleship known as the "Ship of Death" in the deserts of West Africa while helping a WHO doctor being hounded by a ruthless dictator.

programme.title: The Man With The Iron Fists 2
programme.desc: Thaddeus is attacked on his way to the Wu Chi Temple but is saved by a couple who treat his wounds and offer him refuge. Soon, he becomes involved in their local conflict.

programme.title: The Secret Agent Part 1
programme.desc: An explosive and heart-breaking adaptation of Joseph Conrads classic novel of terrorism, espionage and betrayal.

programme.title: The Secret Agent Part 2
programme.desc: An explosive and heart-breaking adaptation of Joseph Conrads classic novel of terrorism, espionage and betrayal.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: With the worlds smartest, bravest, and most highly trained women all over the globe, there are now teams of Angels guided by multiple Bosleys taking on the toughest jobs everywhere.

programme.title: Blue Streak
programme.desc: A convicted thief poses as a cop in order to retrieve a stolen diamond.

programme.title: DOA: Dead Or Alive
programme.desc: The plot revolves around four female fighters who begin as rivals, but subsequently find themselves teaming up against another force.

programme.title: Red
programme.desc: When retired CIA agent finds himself the target of a deadly assassin he reaches out to his old work friends in a bid to learn the truth while staying out of the mysterious enemy's clutches.

programme.title: Ancient Powers S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Kill or be Killed - In a world where enemies watch for weakness, our ancient powers must use all their strength and cunning to defend their people and conquer new lands. Who will rise to the challenge of the battlefield.

programme.desc: Kuala Lumpur to Johor Bahru - In Kuala Lumpur, Michael tries the ancient art of pewter smithing and learns how the discovery of tin transformed a muddy estuary into Malaysia's thriving capital.

programme.title: Lion: The Rise and Fall of the Marsh Pride S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Marsh Pride of lions have lived for generations in Kenya's famous Maasai Mara Reserve. The pride's history is a tale of shifting loyalties, bloody take overs and sheer resilience. Naturalists, guides, vets and conservationists in Kenya and back in the UK offer a unique perspective on the life of these lions.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Unseen Adventures S1 Ep1
programme.desc: In the first instalment Joanna explores the incredible islands of Japan, before jumping on board the Trans-Siberian Railway into Russia.

programme.title: Engineering Repurposed S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Marvel at a recording studio that turned an outdated vessel into a boat that really rocks, then travel to a high-end hotel with a catch: it used to be a prison.

programme.title: Robson Green: Extreme Fisherman S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Venezuela - Robson Green heads to Venezuela to catch three kinds of billfish, before meeting a 20-ton whale shark.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Wild Coast Ep2
programme.desc: Go up against Australias wiliest gladiators and their impressive arsenals. Learn if these weapons, such as the kangaroos deadly boxing moves and the redback spiders precision-engineered traps, can help them survive the ravages of climate change.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Lean on Me Ep2
programme.desc: Observe blossoming friendships and interspecies bonds in nursery school, and peek inside a bromance among junior-school buds Valentino, Yutris and Madara. See distractible Beni lean into his love of food and get a beating from a more-senior pupil.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 - Otago Peninsula/ Muaupoko Ep2
programme.desc: Set sail for New Zealands Otago Peninsula, a breeding refuge for endangered seabirds and marine mammals. Watch as sea lions, albatrosses, red-billed gulls, white-fronted terns, and fairy prions find mates, then nurture the next generation.

programme.title: Baboons: Rules of the Troop
programme.desc: Follow four families of four different species - the resourceful Beach Troop, the warlike Desert Troop, the disciplined River Troop, and the peaceful Mountain Band - to find out why these primates are among the most successful animals in Africa.

programme.title: The Great Elephant Tale
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of three elephants across three very distinct African habitats. Their travels combine to tell the story of how these emotional and intelligent creatures evolved over millions of years to survive on the continent.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - A Close Encounter Ep2
programme.desc: Feel the heat as rising temps mean that water is getting scarce. The Manzi pack must stand alongside predators to hydrate at a remaining precious water spot. Hunt with Wekas pack to feed the pups, and watch the Stork Colony thrive against all odds.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - A Busy Bay Ep3
programme.desc: Get ready to rumble in Marina Bay, where the Nomads and Townies are squatting while Anna and the Bay Family are away upriver. Soak up the peaceful otter life in this luxurious waterway before the surprise early return of its rightful owners.

programme.title: Wild Crusades 1 - The Elephant Dilemma Ep2
programme.desc: Theres a new arrival at the Elephant Transit Home: a sick elephant calf abandoned near a reserve, another victim in the battle for space between humans and elephants. Study the innovative efforts to end this conflict, led by Dr. Pruthu Fernando.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Waterhole Ep1
programme.desc: Witness clashes over precious resources when the dry season brings a band of gladiators to an African savannah watering hole. See a lion-elephant territory brawl, an ant raid on a termite mound, and a honey badgers risky dance with a deadly snake.

programme.desc: Agonize over a lost Stork pack puppy, and tussle with Manzi pups who are sorting their place in the hierarchy, figuring out noisy-neighbor friends and foes. Hop on a search mission with Julz for the missing Kakuli pack in the desolate Badlands.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 12 Ep12
programme.desc: Check in with the centres resident turkey vulture, whos ready for release and in search of a flock. While Nathalie and her team rush to secure funding for a new facility, the medical team is baffled by a toad who has mysteriously taken ill.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Three's a Crowd Ep4
programme.desc: Welcome Annas clan back to Marina Bay, where two otter families have been trespassing. Feel the heat when Mia catches Annas scent and hustles the Townies out of reach. Then hold tight as the Nomads remain blissfully unaware of the coming conflict.

programme.title: Wild Crusades 1 - The Monkey Diaries Ep3
programme.desc: Hidden in the jungles of Sri Lanka is the toque macaque. Endemic to the island, these feisty group-living monkeys are found nowhere else on earth. And they are at the heart of the longest primate research project ever undertaken. Dr Wolfgang Dittus is on a quest to understand their complex society.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Growing Pains Ep3
programme.desc: Experience a roller coaster of emotions and growing pains as the sanctuarys orangutans move through six grades toward their release into the wild. Discover how Dillas fate suddenly changes, and watch as big boy Beni goes on an unwelcome diet.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 - Top of the South/ Te Tau Ihu Ep3
programme.desc: Uncover a land of opposites atop New Zealands South Island, where one of the worlds longest sandbars attracts bar-tailed godwits and hungry pilot whales, and drowned river valleys provide a buffet for dusky dolphins and New Zealand fur seals.

programme.desc: Meet the unlikely collaborators working to ensure mutual survival in the Kalahari Basin. Learn of an elephant clans symbiotic link to fruiting anaboom trees, a meerkats alliance with a feisty drongo bird, and more flora-and-fauna odd couples.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Pushed to the Limits Ep2
programme.desc: Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year. Witness co-operation between elephant herds in their desperate search for water and meet a meerkats strange babysitter, who helps the next generation survive.

programme.desc: Experience a roller coaster of emotions and growing pains as the sanctuarys orangutans move through six grades toward their release into the wild. Discover how Dillas fate suddenly changes, and watch as big boy Beni goes on an unwelcome diet.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 - Top of the South/ Te Tau Ihu Ep3
programme.desc: Uncover a land of opposites atop New Zealands South Island, where one of the worlds longest sandbars attracts bar-tailed godwits and hungry pilot whales, and drowned river valleys provide a buffet for dusky dolphins and New Zealand fur seals.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Into the Heat Ep1
programme.desc: Meet the unlikely collaborators working to ensure mutual survival in the Kalahari Basin. Learn of an elephant clans symbiotic link to fruiting anaboom trees, a meerkats alliance with a feisty drongo bird, and more flora-and-fauna odd couples.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Pushed to the Limits Ep2
programme.desc: Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year. Witness co-operation between elephant herds in their desperate search for water and meet a meerkats strange babysitter, who helps the next generation survive.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Three's a Crowd Ep4
programme.desc: Welcome Annas clan back to Marina Bay, where two otter families have been trespassing. Feel the heat when Mia catches Annas scent and hustles the Townies out of reach. Then hold tight as the Nomads remain blissfully unaware of the coming conflict.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 12 Ep12
programme.desc: Check in with the centres resident turkey vulture, whos ready for release and in search of a flock. While Nathalie and her team rush to secure funding for a new facility, the medical team is baffled by a toad who has mysteriously taken ill.

programme.title: Baboons: Rules of the Troop
programme.desc: Follow four families of four different species - the resourceful Beach Troop, the warlike Desert Troop, the disciplined River Troop, and the peaceful Mountain Band - to find out why these primates are among the most successful animals in Africa.

programme.title: The Great Elephant Tale
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of three elephants across three very distinct African habitats. Their travels combine to tell the story of how these emotional and intelligent creatures evolved over millions of years to survive on the continent.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Growing Pains Ep3
programme.desc: Experience a roller coaster of emotions and growing pains as the sanctuarys orangutans move through six grades toward their release into the wild. Discover how Dillas fate suddenly changes, and watch as big boy Beni goes on an unwelcome diet.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 - Top of the South/ Te Tau Ihu Ep3

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Into the Heat Ep1

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - Big Cats, Big Trouble Ep4
programme.desc: Dodge a leopard with the Manzi dogs while they treat themselves to a stolen feast. No such luck for the Kakuli pack on the hunt, as theyre foiled by a brave puku antelope. Find the stork pack, and retreat from charging elephants with Jules and Simon.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Apex Predators Ep1
programme.desc: Apex predators seem to have won the evolutionary lottery. These species hunt and kill with superior strength, and attack with impressive strategy and mechanics. They are at the top of their game and at the top of the food chain.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Battle for the Bay Ep5
programme.desc: Follow the Bay Familys matriarch as she chases the Nomads out of her territory for good, and examine the surprising birthing den where the Townies leader, Mia, settles in. Then kick back with the Mangrove Family as they pal around with stray dogs.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 - Spring Ep1
programme.desc: Its spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 3 - Back to School Ep1
programme.desc: Start a promising new term at the Orangutan Jungle School in Borneo. See newbie Bumi struggle to focus, track skittish Rumbas first timid steps toward independence, and cheer on star student Valentino as he experiences a bumpy start to college.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Collisions Ep1
programme.desc: Observe the natural and human forces that have shaped Ningaloo Reef, Cape Range, and Exmouth Gulf with Tim, Traditional Owners, and other experts. Check out a million-year-old fossil reef, a gargantuan fish, and a ray that packs quite a punch.

Now it's up to the Dew Drops to find Captain Meow Meow and get that splinter out.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep10
programme.desc: Slobber Power - Cutter gets a chance to be a "mom" when a newly hatched dragon bonds with him, and they'll both be needed to get the others out of a tangled mess.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep21
programme.desc: Monkey Planet - King Julien declares that lemurs will land on the moon and seeks help from a former astronaut: Stanislav, the Russian Space Monkey.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep22
programme.desc: True Bromance - When King Julien discovers that Maurice is moonlighting as adviser to another king, the two best friends break up.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep47
programme.desc: Lucky and the Warm Welcome - While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. programme.desc: Winkly Fest / Snow - When Pixie struggles to recreate an old tradition perfectly, the kids realize they can make their own traditions./ A story told by Chef J inspires Juniper to go in search of snow.

programme.desc: Gratitude Day / Extra Set Of Wings - When Phoebes Gratitude Day card flies away before she can give it to Marcus, the Dews try to help her recreate it - perfectly. programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep49
programme.desc: Grugs First Chance / Furry Road - Tired of settling disputes between Valleyites, Grug invents Chance, a two-sided rock that can be flipped to determine all decisions in the Valley; In a nature documentary-style, Thunk tells the story of Beary, a peaceful Thunk-like cub that struggles to fit into a violent bear owl culture

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep50
programme.desc: My Big Fat Gran Wedding / The Strutting Edge - After being called out for having commitment issues by Grug, Gran decides to make the ultimate commitment: marrying Mow!; After embarrassingly choking at the prior Valley's beastie Pageant, Eep asks previous winner Gran to train her to be the best

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep20
programme.desc: El Apasionado Negocio de la Niera - Frederic makes a play to take over the town's babysitters by instituting "senior sitting"

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep21
programme.desc: Plushythingy - When Frederic Estes creates the cutest plushy ever that is the hottest toy in town, the field team must destroy the last remaining one but are powerless against its cuteness

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep23
programme.desc: Picture Perfect - Tim and Boss Baby want to bond with Dad by recreating a perfect "Dudes Weekend' camping trip, culminating in a photo opp, but everything seems to go wrong

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep17
programme.desc: Hide The Lightning - Po and team go to the city of Tikal to get more information on the Protector, but it's easier said than done, since nobody in the town actually knows the identity of the Protector. Blade becomes increasingly frustrated and Po attempts to help her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep18
programme.desc: The Beast - Po and team play a game of Pok-ta-pok against a family of armadillos for the opportunity to talk one on one with Zuma, the leader. The game brings out a highly competitive and aggressive side to Blade, known as "The Beast." Back in China, Colin and Weimin find the Pirate Queen and become part of her pirate crew.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep19
programme.desc: An Uphill Battle - The Dragon Knights make a deal for the Storm Wheel but first must obtain the other Storm Wheel from a mysterious mad scientist. Though Mastodon continues to warn the team about the dangers in using the Tianshang Weapons, they use them in a fight against Klaus and Veruca. The clash of the weapons wakes a dormant volcano!

programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Disturbing Dilemma Of The Dysfunctional Doppelgangers - The crew meets their blue-hued doppelgngers when they crash-land on an alien planet where kids call all the shots.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep46
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Confusing Crisis Of The Conniving Captive - Melvin isn't exactly their friend ... but it's not like George and Harold can just let him be held captive by diabolical Biglyans, right? Right?!?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep47
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Aggravated Assault Of The Alien Armada - Oh, the indignity: George and Harold are forced to perform spa treatments on gigantic Biglyans. Also, Dr. Fitzgibbons reveals a shocking secret.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep10
programme.desc: Yukon Do It! - Arf gets a chance to run with real sled dogs when he travels with Wally and Wenda to wintry northern Canada to deliver an important package to Wizard Whitebeard, who is off watching the Northern Lights with a fellow wizard.

programme.title: Olivia Ep49
programme.desc: Olivia's Snow Day - It's a snow day and school's closed. Olivia takes to the snow-covered streets with Julian as her cameraman, to report on all the snow day happenings. The biggest story of the day turns out to be an alleged sighting of the legendary abominable snowman. Can it be true? Olivia tracks down the real story.

programme.title: Olivia Ep50
programme.desc: Olivia's Ice Spectacular - Olivia can't wait to see skating star Sonja Spencer perform in Cinderella on Ice. She's sure she'll be the lucky audience member chosen to skate with Sonja, and begins practicing on the skating rink she makes in her own backyard. When the show is canceled, Olivia decides the show must go on and she and her friends stage their own ice spectacular.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep47
programme.desc: Big Chris Gets Lucky - Big Chris realises that he only ever has good luck when he has his lucky mascot with him. But what happens when he loses it on race day?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep48
programme.desc: Silver Hatch Fun Run - Roary and Plugger really want Big Chris to take part in the fun run but Big Chris isn't so sure. Can they make sure he trains for it without even realising?

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep21
programme.desc: Why Rhino Charges - You see there was a time when Rhino didn't charge and he couldn't see very well at all. Poor old Rhino really wanted to be invited to the Dance of the Horns up on the plains with Buffalo and all the other horned animals. But Rhino didn't have a horn, so he wasn't allowed. The Monkeys decide to help Rhino and make him a horn from a piece of old wood. But when Rhino wakes up he doesn't know what it is. Aargh! Thing on the end of my nose! CHAAaarge!' And that's Why Rhino Charges. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep22
programme.desc: Why Caterpillar Is Never In A Hurry - You see Caterpillar was never in a hurry. When all the animals were racing around Tinga Tinga getting ready for the Best-dressed parade, Caterpillar was happy to sit in a tree and munch on leaves saying Po-le, po-le, slowly, slowly, good things come to those who wait'. Then one day the rains come and Caterpillar disappears into a cocoon. What's happening?' questions Elephant. Wait and see' says Tortoise wisely Wait and See'. Then Caterpillar transforms into the most beautiful butterfly ever!... But who wins the Best-dressed parade? Tales from Africa

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep404
programme.desc: Sun, Sea and Snow - Peppa and her friends and family are looking forward to a trip to the beach where they can make sandcastles, but when they arrive at the beach there is too much snow!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep405
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Computer - Mummy Pig gives her old PC to Granny and Grandpa Pig. Will they be able to use it?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep174
programme.desc: Achoo ! - Bubu teaches Christopher about allergies. And when he witnesses Anna sneezing uncontrollably when she is around Froga, he is convinced that she is allergic to her! They wonder if they will ever be able to live life as they once did!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep175
programme.desc: The Giant Strawberry - When Froga discovers an amazing oversized strawberry in her garden, she quickly becomes obsessed with it. Things come to a head when Froga discovers a bunch more giant strawberries and even Anna is driven away.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Cranberry Cookies / Snap Pea Stir-Fry - Tiny Chef bakes cookies to welcome a lady bug who moves into the neighborhood. // Tiny Chef makes snap pea stir fry and learns that his friends are good kitchen helpers when he has trouble cooking on his own.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep319
programme.desc: Paddington and the Cursed Halloween Show / Paddington saves the Mooncake Festival - It's Halloween, but will a curse on the theatre stop the community putting on their special spooky play? // Taylor the lifeguard arrives in Windsor Gardens just in time to save the Mooncake Festival with Paddington.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Paddington Needs a Hero - Paddington finds a four-legged hero when he gets stuck in an igloo at the winter festival.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep708
programme.desc: Mission to Mars - NASA's Commander Megan is back! And she's taking Blaze and his friends to... Mars! But when Crusher accidently detaches the rocket ship's thrusters, it's up to Mars Rover Blaze to navigate Mars and get those thrusters back!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Pups Save Jake's Cake / Pups Save a Wild Ride - Ryder and the Pups need to help get a surprise birthday ice cream cake up to Jake's cabin. // Alex and Daring Danny X are snowboarding right for Risky Ridge and need help from the PAW Patrol.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1021
programme.desc: Pups and Cats Save HumCatDingerMan / Pups Save A Turbot Tournament - Mayor Humdinger becomes HumCatDingerMan to steal the spotlight from the Cat Pack. // The pups must save Granny Tilly when an impromptu Turbot Tournament gets overly competitive.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Pups Save a Hoot - During a bad wind storm, Ryder and the PAW Patrol have to save an Owl trapped in a blown over tree and reunite her baby.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Drive-In Movie Theater / The Crew Finds A Rainbow Treasure - Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it! // When Grandpa tells the pups about a secret buried treasure, they find out the key to finding this treasure is construction teamwork!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep110
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Pig Barn / The Crew Builds A Giant Runway - A new farmer in town asks Rubble & Crew to build a barn for her pig! But will it be done in time for the big Pig Party? // Motor's super special birthday present gets delayed when the pups realize Builder Cove's airport needs a bigger runway.

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Big Red Chicken Wake Up! / The Mystery Gift - Dora and Boots have to wake up the Big Red Chicken before he floats over a waterfall! // Dora and friends must solve a series of questions and challenges to open a mysterious gift.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Captain Kelp / Teensy the Tardigrade - As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick? // Baby Shark adopts a teensy tiny pet, but is he ready for a big responsibility?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Baby Mayor / Sink or Swim - The fate of the city's squidapple supply lies in Baby's fins when he accidentally assumes the role of Mayor on a big day. // The Sharks go on the family game show Sink or Swim and find they're in hot water with their competition, the Fishes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Hospital - Peppa and her playgroup friends go with Madame Gazelle to visit Pedro Pony, who is in hospital with a broken leg.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Spring - Grandpa Pig organises a chocolate egg hunt for Peppa and her friends. Will the piglets track down the treats?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep408

programme.desc: Non-stop breaking stories, expert analysis and extensive news coverage every hour.

programme.title: Headline News

programme.title: My Debal Diaries
programme.desc: Author Melissa De Silva travels to the adopted homelands of her ancestors to find the origins of her culture, identity, and the influences that went into the quintessential Eurasian dish, Debal.

programme.title: East Asia Tonight
programme.desc: Spotlight on East Asia, a region steeped in history and now helping to write the future of our world. We'll break down the key stories and explain why they matter.

programme.title: ROOTS: A Greening Journey
programme.desc: Singapore horticulturists search for new climate proof trees in Latin America, where years ago, the city-state's greening pioneers sourced plants that helped transform the island into a Garden City.
