programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Biz Stream Special Edition
programme.desc: This episode features an emergency information verification service and a cutting edge fire suppression product that can be installed almost anywhere.

programme.title: The Beauty Of Japanese Swords
programme.desc: Japanese swords, admired since ancient times for their beauty, are amazing works of art. This time, Hotei Kunihiro, a sword conveying a swordsmith's wish for peace.

programme.title: Ramen Japan
programme.desc: Two local takes on ramen that kept Hiroshima fed during postwar reconstruction; flavors passed down for generations.

programme.title: Ramen Japan
programme.desc: Explore a surprising take on ramen loved by a fishing town. Let it warm you up when it's cold!

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Hit The Road Gunma
programme.desc: To truly enjoy Gunma, travel by car is key. We start from Takasaki, where the bullet train stops, and make our way to Kusatsu hot springs, with world Heritage sites and local food along the way.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Noda Hideki received the Distinguished Artist Award from the International Society for the Performing Arts in 2023. In this two-part interview, he talks about theater that transcends boundaries.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We meet Pakistani Habib ur Rahman who creates power wheelchairs in Kobayashi City, Miyazaki, as well as Chinese Xia Siya who works in children's education support in Yubari City, Hokkaido.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Biz Stream Special Edition
programme.desc: This episode examines ways Japanese companies are looking to overcome some of the main issues that are preventing hydrogen from catching on as a clean source of energy.

programme.title: Trails To Oishii Tokyo Mini 5Min.
programme.desc: It's kuzu, a Japanese ingredient with over 1,000 years of history. Kuzu powder is used in many ways. Sweeten it to make a tasty treat, use it as a thickener, or sprinkle it on food to enhance umami.

programme.title: Learn Japanese From The News
programme.desc: Starting July, all climbers who ascend Mt. Fuji from Yamanashi Prefecture will be charged a 2,000-yen toll. We review the story and learn about the suffix "-kata" in "noborikata" (the way to climb).

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: #20 Please don't put wasabi in. / To ask someone not to put something in your food or drink, say the name of the item, the particle "wa," and finally "irenaide kudasai."

programme.title: Evacuee Support As Time Passes
programme.desc: Local foreign residents have been helping people stricken by the Noto Peninsula Earthquake through ongoing support activities, starting with an emergency curry kitchen and meeting changing needs.

programme.desc: This time we introduce "A Final Lesson: Atomic Bomb Survivor Kajiya Fumiaki," which shows an ex-teacher and hibakusha, Kajiya Fumiaki trying to deliver his story to elementary school pupils.

programme.title: My Street Piano

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: "Title Unifications" - Champions and interim champions face off to determine who rules the division in four incredible title unification bouts on this episode of UFC Unleashed. Featuring Conor McGregor, Georges St-Pierre, Max Holloway, and Brock Lesnar.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep907MorenovsFigueiredo3
programme.desc: The first champion from Mexico, Brandon Moreno, continues his rivalry with former flyweight champion Deiveson Figueiredo as they meet for a third time for the 125-pound belt. See both men train and prepare ahead of their battle at UFC 270.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep603LockedInWMMADecadeUnbreakableZhangWeiliFighterFocusPolyanaVianaDayOneMayceeBarber
programme.desc: We celebrate a decade of Women in the UFC by looking back at the fighters and moments that make up this decorated history. We dive into the relationship between Zhang Weili and Cai Xuejun and discover how they built Weilis impressive career, crowning her the first-ever Chinese champion in UFC history. Polyana Viana shares her love of fan fiction outside of the Octagon at a cosplay convention. Maycee Barber looks back at her UFC debut in Day One.

programme.title: SERIE A TOP 10 SAVES
programme.desc: SERIE A TOP 10 SAVES - Ridiculous reflexes from Vicario, Onana & Maignan. 10 of the best saves from the 22/23 Serie A season.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC282BlachowiczvsAnkalaev
programme.desc: At UFC 282, Former champion Jan Blachowicz fought for the vacant light heavyweight title against surging contender Magomed Ankalaev. Plus, Paddy The Baddy Pimblett took on Jared Gordon. See the entire main card, and more, of UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep8
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep19
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback Ep902EFN041PoiriervsHoo
programme.desc: An enhanced replay of the sports biggest fights, featuring never-before-seen footage from specialty cams.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Submissions
programme.desc: Debuts - Earning a submission victory inside the famed UFC Octagon takes skills and talent that few possess. UFC Ultimate Submissions brings you a collection of the greatest grappling finishes the MMA world has ever seen.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep907MorenovsFigueiredo3
programme.desc: The first champion from Mexico, Brandon Moreno, continues his rivalry with former flyweight champion Deiveson Figueiredo as they meet for a third time for the 125-pound belt. See both men train and prepare ahead of their battle at UFC 270.

programme.title: WorldSBK - Pirelli Portuguese Round Highlights
programme.desc: WorldSBK - Pirelli Portuguese Round Highlights - The FIM Superbike World Championship is the leading production motorcycle racing series in the world with over 100 riders from more than 20 countries competing in various classes over 12 rounds.

programme.title: 2023-2024 KOVO V-League Women - Round 5: IBK Altos vs GS Caltex
programme.desc: Round 5: IBK Altos vs GS Caltex - The 20th season of the KOVO V-League Women sees reigning champions EX Hi-pass defend their title against six fellow professional volleyball teams for the coveted championship in South Korea.

programme.title: SERIE A TOP 10 FREE KICKS
programme.desc: SERIE A TOP 10 FREE KICKS - Set-piece superiority. Dead balls that turned deadly accurate from Serie As 22/23 season.

programme.title: UFC 305: Du Plessis vs. Adesanya
programme.desc: Prelims - The RAC Arena in Perth, Australia is the place for one of the biggest events of 2024, as UFC 305 presents a championship showdown that will shake the foundations of the mixed martial arts world. In the main event, the bad blood between newly crowned middleweight champion Dricus Du Plessis and former champ Israel Adesanya has reached a boiling point. They have the chance to settle the score with 185-pound gold on the line as New Zealands The Last Stylebender attempts to regain his crown from the hard-hitting South African, who is unbeaten in seven UFC fights

programme.title: UFC 305: Du Plessis vs. Adesanya
programme.desc: Main Event - The RAC Arena in Perth, Australia is the place for one of the biggest events of 2024, as UFC 305 presents a championship showdown that will shake the foundations of the mixed martial arts world.
